ch0160_10_suiren/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
You’re looking lively today.
ch0160_10_suiren/0101_0701_02_10: Shall we play a trick on someone?
ch0160_10_suiren/7101_0701_01_10:
The fragrant aroma of flowers is the source of
Tapu Lele’s energy, so it often goes looking
for them.
ch0160_10_suiren/7101_0701_02_10: Would you like to come with us?
ch0160_10_suiren/7102_0701_01_10:
Mallow and Kiawe said this sygna suit
looks pretty.
ch0160_10_suiren/7102_0701_02_10: I’m not used to frilly clothes, but I do enjoy praise.
ch0160_10_suiren/7103_0701_01_10:
My sisters are both very young and immediately
say what comes to mind.
ch0160_10_suiren/7103_0701_02_10: Although they’re cute, their innocence can be scary.
ch0160_10_suiren/7104_0701_01_10:
The other day, I met a young swimmer at the
beach who looked a bit unwell.
ch0160_10_suiren/7104_0701_02_10:
But when Tapu Lele sprinkled its scales over him,
he perked right up.
ch0160_10_suiren/7104_0701_03_10:
He went back out to the water in good health.
Maybe he’ll return the favor someday.
ch0160_10_suiren/7105_0701_01_10:
The best part of a joke is when you surprise
someone.
ch0160_10_suiren/7105_0701_02_10: The look on their face is priceless.
ch0160_10_suiren/1701_0702_01_10: I expect a top-quality fishing rod in return.
ch0160_10_suiren/2501_0701_01_10:
Tapu Lele, the guardian deity of Akala, looks
cute...but it can be guilelessly cruel.
ch0160_10_suiren/2501_0701_02_10:
Its scales have a healing effect, and it sprinkles
them on people and Pokémon for its own
amusement, but...
ch0160_10_suiren/2501_0701_03_10:
If you touch too many at once, your body can’t
keep up.
ch0160_10_suiren/2501_0701_04_10: I’m not joking, by the way. It’s true.
ch0160_10_suiren/2501_0702_01_10:
My Tapu Lele is different from the one that’s the
guardian deity of Akala.
ch0160_10_suiren/2501_0702_02_10:
Even so, I’m humbled to have Tapu Lele as my
partner.
ch0160_10_suiren/2511_0701_01_10: There are a lot of fashionable Trainers on Pasio.
ch0160_10_suiren/2511_0701_02_10: I got this sygna suit on Pasio, too.
ch0160_10_suiren/2511_0701_03_10: How do I look? Does it suit me?
ch0160_10_suiren/2511_0702_01_10:
Alola can be quite warm, so a lot of people wear
lighter clothes.
ch0160_10_suiren/2511_0702_02_10:
But the people on Pasio come from all over, so
they wear all sorts of things. It’s fun to see!
ch0160_10_suiren/3001_0701_01_10: *yawn* Oh dear. Is my yawn catching?
ch0160_10_suiren/3003_0701_01_10:
I saw some incredible splashes in the sea. They
must have been made by a strapping
young swimmer.
ch0160_10_suiren/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening. I’m glad to see you looking lively,
but be sure to get some rest tonight.
